columns.name: SequencingLabID
columns.dc:description: ID of the lab generating the sequencing data

columns.name: IndividualID
columns.dc:description: Foreign Key into the Individuals-Table. Gives the ID of the individual that is analysed.

columns.name: SeqLabName
columns.dc:description: Name of the lab performing the Sequencing

columns.name: SkeletalElement
columns.dc:description: Name of the skeletal element analysed

columns.name: LibraryType
columns.dc:description: DNA Library construction (Non-UDG, UDG-half, UDG-full, Single-Stranded-Non-UDG, Multiple)

columns.name: CaptureType
columns.dc:description: Type of Capture (NoCapture, 1240Kcapture, MTcapture, OtherCapture). If not given, assume NoCapture

columns.name: CaptureNote
columns.dc:description: Note describing the capture, in particular of CaptureType was "OtherCapture"

columns.name: NrReadsSequenced
columns.dc:description: Number of raw read or read-pairs sequenced

columns.name: ReferenceGenome
columns.dc:description: Name of reference genome. If Human, use HG19 or HG38.

columns.name: NrReadsMapped
columns.dc:description: Number of reads mapped to the reference genome.

columns.name: NrReadsMappedQF30
columns.dc:description: Number of reads mapped to the reference genome, filtered for mapping quality <=30

columns.name: NrReadsMappedUnique
columns.dc:description: Number of unique reads mapped to the reference genome.

columns.name: NrReadsMappedUniqueQF30
columns.dc:description: Number of unique reads mapped to the reference genome, filtered for mapping quality >= 30

columns.name: rawReadsRepository
columns.dc:description: Repository for sequencing data. Can be "ENA" or "SRA"

columns.name: rawReadsAccessionNrs
columns.dc:description: Accession number(s) to raw read files and/or alignments

columns.name: frac5pCT
columns.dc:description: Fraction of reads with C->T substitutions at the 5p end of the read. Used as a proxy for post-mortem DNA damage

columns.name: frac3pGA
columns.dc:description: Fraction of reads with G->A substitutions at the 3p end of the read. Used as a proxy for post-mortem DNA damage

columns.name: fracContam
columns.dc:description: Estimate for the library contamination

columns.name: contamNote
columns.dc:description: Optional note for how the contamination was estimated

columns.name: geneticSex
columns.dc:description: Inferred sex genotype (XX, XY, Other)

columns.name: MThaplotype
columns.dc:description: Mitochondrial haplotype

columns.name: Yhaplotype
columns.dc:description: Y chromosome haplotype

columns.name: seqNote
columns.dc:description: Optional general note for the sequencing data

columns.name: Source
columns.dc:description: BibTEX key(s) for bibliographical source(s)
